articles.title: Horizon's Uplizna gets approval in EU to treat nervous system disorder of eye, spine - Seeking Alpha
articles.description: The European Commission ((EC)) approved Horizon Therapeutics' (HZNP) Uplizna as a standalone therapy for adult patients with neuromyelitis optica spectrum disorder ((NMOSD)) who...

articles.title: EU may offer Hungary, Slovakia exemptions from Russian oil embargo - Reuters
articles.description: The European Commission may spare Hungary and Slovakia from an embargo on buying Russian oil, now under preparation, wary of how dependent the two countries are on Russian crude, two EU officials said on Monday.
articles.content: BRUSSELS, May 2 (Reuters) - The European Commission may spare Hungary and Slovakia from an embargo on buying Russian oil, now under preparation, wary of how dependent the two countries are on Russian… [+2756 chars]

articles.title: Oil down US$1 on China growth worries, while EU weighs Russian crude ban - CNA
articles.description:
MELBOURNE: Oil prices fell on Monday (May 2) in holiday-sapped trade in Asia as concerns about weak economic growth in China, the world's top oil importer, outweighed fears of potential supply stress from a looming European Union ban on Russian crude.

articles.title: EU energy ministers hold crisis talks after Russian gas cuts - Reuters
articles.description: Energy ministers from European Union countries hold emergency talks on Monday, as the bloc strives for a united response to Moscow's demand that European buyers pay for Russian gas in roubles or face their supply being cut off.

articles.title: May Day rallies in Europe urge more help as inflation bites - The Associated Press
